alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 11:32PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected, mostly above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible above 6000 feet; total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches possible above 8000 feet. South-southwest winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, particularly along State Route 157 and State Route 158. Strong winds could cause damage to trees or powerlines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of the snowfall will occur between 10 PM tonight and 4 AM PST Sunday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
